LanguageData.RT_SdKfz234_Vehicle.label: Sd.Kfz.234/2
LanguageData.RT_SdKfz234_Vehicle.description:
A 8-wheeled scout vehicle with high speed on ground but could be easily damaged, eqipped grenade shells.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x2, Gunner x2
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel:</color> Chemfuel

<color=#b0e0e6>CE Ammo:</color> 
81mm (Main cannon)
7.62x54mmR (Coaxial MG)
30x29mm grenade Shell(grenade launcher)
